properties.Initial_Detail_of_Accident: SSM reported a section of precast fell approx. 5FT while being lifted by crane. No injures reported.
properties.Detail_of_Description: While commencing hoisting operation operator failed test brake system.  Several days of rain preceeded the opeation.  The crane lifted finish panel from truck bed, brake did not hold and load along with hosi rope fell to ground approx 10 ft.
properties.Cause_Equipment: Operator failed to test brake system b/4 commencing hoisting operation.  Several days of rain preceeded the opeation.  The crane lifted finish panel from truck bed about 6 ft, brake did not hold load.  Brake system was unable to hold wire rope and load w

properties.Initial_Detail_of_Accident: Site Safety Manager reported rigger got finger caught between load in process of being rigged and the block on the crane.
properties.Detail_of_Description: worker error - Martin Gibson rigger while lifting steel beams for placement aparently issued the all clear signal however bent over to retrieve an article also grabbed the rope and pinched his fingers (ring and pinky) between the block wire rope and shea
properties.Cause_Equipment: worker error - Martin Gibson rigger while lifting steel beams for placement aparently issued the all clear signal however bent over to retrieve an article also grabbed the rope and pinched his fingers (ring and pinky) between the block wire rope and shea

properties.Initial_Detail_of_Accident: NYPD IS REQUESTING DOB INSPECTOR FOR THE OPERATION OF A CRANE OVER AN OPEN STREET
properties.Detail_of_Description: No accident/incident nor injured personnel.  Crane operating safetly at time of inspection.  Request was for inspection of crane operating over open street on 9/18/14.
properties.Cause_Equipment: no related incident or accident.  Request for inspection was for crane operating over open street.  At time of inspection no unsafe operation was observed.
